title: Modern Bank Application
description: A single page web application that is of a conceptual banking company. The purpose of this project was to become more familiar with layout design, Next.js, and deploying a web application.

title: Sorting Visualizer
description: Designed for learning more about React and the DOM. You can select a variation of sorting algorithms and visually see them in action.

title: Portfolio Optimizer
description: CLI application that takes stock ticker input and generates an optimal portfolio weighting. It will display the optimal portfolio weightings against an equal-weighted portfolio consisting of the same securities.

title: DCF Model Automation
description: CLI application that automates the Discounted Cash Flow model creation process for financial modelling uses. This tool saves an immense amount of time that is expended on things such as locating, organizing, and filtering data.

title: Stock Information Tool
description: Single page web application that allows the easy search of stock tickers and allows for a visual table view of all the data. Exports to .csv filetypes.
